title: Happy Voodoo Gris Gris
description: With Happy Voodoo Gris Gris, readers can make creative charms and talismans to bring good luck, spread happiness and joy to friends and family. Over 45 easy-to-make projects - including bracelets, necklaces, amulets, bags, stuffed animals, cases, dolls and bobbles - are perfect for readers to give or keep. The patterns provided in the back of the book are easy to trace, scan or copy and they are created from various items such as bits of fabric, beads, decorative threads, shellfish, spangles, raffia and more. Everyone needs a little Gris-Gris in their lives.
author: Anne-Claire Leveqe
